.box {
  position: absolute;
  background-color: rgba(46, 37, 37, 0);
  z-index: 3;
  width: 34px;
  height: 34px;
}
.box:hover + .mush {
  animation: mush 0.5s linear forwards;
  opacity: 1;
}
@keyframes mush {
  0% {
    transform: scale(0.8) translate(-0px, -0px);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.1) translate(-0px, -80px);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1.1) translate(-0px, -35px);
  }
}
